record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 997 AND S. 1001

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, before I turn to my distinguished Republican colleague, it is my understanding that there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for a second time.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills, en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
